reviewText: Okay so we learned how to do the traditional country 2-step thanks to Shawn and his crew and decided we would give the triple-2 step a shot to mix things up a bit with slower songs on at the club.  This video once again was an impressive  mix of perfect paced step by step instruction with good music and as always Shawn and his wifes personable personalities.  Excellent instruction for beginners!

This is a good basic 101 country & western dance instruction.  It is a general DVD for country & western dancing.  It has very little specifically for the triple two step dance.  It is way too expensive for a basic county & western instructional DVD.
